emails.subject: Urgent: Password Expiration Notice!
emails.message:
Dear User,

Your corporate email password is set to expire in 24 hours. To avoid being locked out of your account, please update your password immediately by clicking the link below:

[Update My Password](https://secure-company.com/update-password)

Failure to do so may result in temporary suspension of your email access.

Best Regards,
IT Security Team

emails.subject: Congratulations! You’ve Won a Gift Card!
emails.message:
Hi [Name],

You have been randomly selected to receive a free $50 Amazon gift card as a token of our appreciation! Claim your reward now by clicking the link below:

[Get My Reward](https://secure-company.com/gift-card)

Hurry, this offer expires in 24 hours!

Best,
Rewards Team

emails.subject: Important: HR Policy Update - Action Required
emails.message:
Dear Employee,

Please review the latest company policy updates and acknowledge your compliance by clicking the link below. Your response is required within 48 hours.

[Review Policy](https://secure-company.com/hr-policy)

Failure to comply may result in administrative action.

Best,
HR Department

emails.subject: New Payroll System - Verify Your Details
emails.message:
Dear Team Member,

We are transitioning to a new payroll system, and we require your confirmation of account details to ensure seamless salary payments. Please verify your information using the secure portal below:

[Confirm My Details](https://secure-company.com/payroll-update)

Best Regards,
Payroll Team

emails.subject: Your Bank Account Has Been Suspended!
emails.message:
Dear Customer,

Unusual activity has been detected on your bank account, leading to a temporary suspension. To reactivate your account, please verify your identity immediately by clicking the link below:

[Verify My Account](https://secure-company.com/banking-security)

If you do not take action within 24 hours, your account may be permanently disabled.

Sincerely,
Bank Security Team

emails.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Free Business Webinar!
emails.message:
Dear [Name],

You are invited to an exclusive webinar on ‘Mastering Digital Marketing in 2025.’ Reserve your spot now and gain access to industry insights from top experts. Click below to register:

[Reserve My Spot](https://secure-company.com/webinar-invite)

Limited seats available!

Best,
Event Team

emails.subject: Your Package Delivery Has Been Delayed
emails.message:
Dear Customer,

Your package scheduled for delivery today has been delayed due to an address verification issue. Please confirm your details to ensure prompt delivery:

[Update My Address](https://secure-company.com/package-update)

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best,
Shipping Support Team

emails.subject: Your Subscription Is About to Expire!
emails.message:
Dear Subscriber,

Your premium subscription for [Streaming Service] is set to expire in 48 hours. Renew now to avoid losing access to your favorite content. Click below to renew:

[Renew Now](https://secure-company.com/subscription-renewal)

Thank you for choosing us!

Best Regards,
Customer Support Team

emails.subject: Security Alert: Unauthorized Login Attempt Detected
emails.message:
Dear User,

We have detected an unauthorized login attempt on your account from a new device. If this was not you, please secure your account immediately:

[Secure My Account](https://secure-company.com/account-security)

If you recognize this activity, no further action is needed.

Stay safe,
Security Team

emails.subject: COVID-19 Workplace Safety Compliance Survey
emails.message:
Dear Employee,

To ensure a safe working environment, we require all employees to complete a short COVID-19 compliance survey. Please submit your response using the link below:

[Complete My Survey](https://secure-company.com/health-survey)

Your participation is mandatory as per company policy.

Best Regards,
Health & Safety Team
